name: Loki and the Crows
description:
Loki is having a grumpy day and the crows are only making it worse. In this 2-d short platform game, your job is to help Loki the cat get past the crows and find the catnip field.

Controls:

HOLD SHIFT TO RUN

Walk Left: A or Left-Arrow
Walk Right: D or Right-Arrow
Run Left: Shift+A or Shift+Left-Arrow
Run Right: Shift+D or Shift+Right-Arrow
Jump: Space

There is only one level currently but we hope to see more from Loki  in some future adventures.  Loki is a very real cat who lives with us and the crows hate him and he loves catnip. This is a true thing,

This game was made for the Low Effort Game jam 4.
